meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an organism that excretes uric acid as the main nitrogenous waste product.
meanings.sent1: The uricotelic bird efficiently removes waste through uric acid excretion.
meanings.sent2: The lizard's uricotelic nature helps it conserve water in arid environments.
meanings.sent3: The uricotelic frog joked that it was the cleanest in the pond.
meanings.sent4: Her uricotelic behavior at work made her stand out among her colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The uricotelic cat's litter box was always odor-free.

meanings.definition: An organism that excretes uric acid as the main nitrogenous waste product.
meanings.sent1: The uricotelic is known for its unique way of waste removal.
meanings.sent2: In the animal kingdom, the uricotelic plays a vital role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The uricotelic in the zoo was the star of the nitrogenous cycle.
meanings.sent4: The uricotelic's waste management system was the envy of other organisms.
meanings.sent5: Children in the biology class were fascinated by the uricotelic's waste process.
